meanings.sent2: Frankfurt is known for its beautiful architecture.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tourist go to Frankfurt? To explore the historic city!
meanings.sent4: In the heart of Europe, Frankfurt stands tall like a beacon of culture.
meanings.sent5: The bustling streets of Frankfurt are filled with life and history.

meanings.sent1: I love the taste of Frankfurt in my sandwich.
meanings.sent2: The grill is sizzling with juicy Frankfurt sausages.
meanings.sent3: Why did the hot dog break up with the Frankfurt? It couldn't ketchup!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling Frankfurt sausages filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The savory flavor of Frankfurt lingers on my taste buds.
